name: Salesforce Ohana Floor
description: Free 61st-floor event space for Bay Area-based nonprofits with capacity up to 250 guests; includes A/V support and event staff; available once every 12 months
fullDescription: Salesforce offers their stunning 61st-floor Ohana Floor with panoramic city views as a free event venue for Bay Area nonprofits, complete with professional event support.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free 61st-floor event space
- Capacity up to 250 guests
- Stunning panoramic city views
- Full A/V support included
- Event staff assistance
- Available once every 12 months per org
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Bay Area-based nonprofit
2. Submit event request online
3. Provide organization and event details
4. Events available weeknights only
5. Wait for approval and confirmation
6. Can use once per 12-month period
address: Salesforce Tower, 415 Mission Street, San Francisco, CA 94105
keywords: Salesforce, Ohana Floor, free event venue, nonprofit venue, San Francisco, Salesforce Tower, 250 guests, panoramic views
